comments.body: You might want to call `mpm --update-db` first, if you're sure about installing latex packages automatically upon installation of the package.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@for %%x in (adjustbox booktabs collectbox fancyvrb ifoddpage mptopdf ucs url) do (
	%PREFIX%\Library\miktex-portable\miktex\bin\mpm --quiet --install %%x
)
rem No final check as this should succeed even if the conda package is updated and the latex packages already installed

comments.body: Note that this might break the conda package if the latex package repository decides to drop/rename one of these latex packages. It seems unlikely but it happened to us more than once in the course of a single year.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@for %%x in (adjustbox booktabs collectbox fancyvrb ifoddpage mptopdf ucs url) do (
	%PREFIX%\Library\miktex-portable\miktex\bin\mpm --quiet --install %%x
)
rem No final check as this should succeed even if the conda package is updated and the latex packages already installed
